name: YOLO (Rein)
description:
This is my first official independent game.

Although it is expected to be a small game, there are still many projects that have not been completed and many bugs.

I will continue to improve it but it will not be a big game, just a light sandbox game

INSTRUCTUONS:

ENTER - In to game

WASD/UP/DOWN/RIGHT/LEFT - MOVE

Mouse left - click to interactive , hold to make item

Mouse right - remove item

ESC - MENU
